name: (Don't) Roll Off The Dice
description: Control a ball with WASD or Arrow-Keys (Move) and Spacebar(Jump) and try to stay on the dice for as long as possible. When the timer finishes 9 dice will be thrown in the airand only 1 will remain on the ground. Your score is the number of eyes thrown by the dice. This is the GameJam project from the GMTK GameJam, only I uploaded an unplayable version to the Jam (only submitted the executable... it was my first upload here). Hope you have fun! :)
